thinking.disposable_income: Greenway/Upper Kirby is an affluent area with median household income well above Houston average, indicating high disposable income and less sensitivity to transportation costs.
thinking.discretionary_consumption: The area features high-end retail, restaurants, and entertainment venues, suggesting residents have significant discretionary spending and can absorb higher transportation costs.
thinking.accessibility: The area has good road infrastructure and moderate transit access with multiple bus routes, though most residents rely on personal vehicles for transportation.
thinking.decision_rationale: 1) Given high income levels, prioritize policies that reduce travel time over cost savings 2) Support moderate tax increases to fund transit improvements while maintaining reasonable driving costs 3) Favor balanced policies that improve both transit and driving times 4) Consider that many residents will continue driving despite fees 5) Select policies that encourage transit use without excessive penalties on driving 6) Focus on proposals with 1.0-1.5% tax rates for sustainable transit funding
